Title: Global LNG exports rise by 3% in 2023 as the US leads for the first time
Description: Global LNG exports rose by about 3% on-year to reach 412.44 mt in 2023, thanks largely to a ramp-up in US shipments that took the country to the top LNG exporter spot for the first time, surpassing rival exporting countries Australia and Qatar.
Author: CK
